Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
I know you must be hard at work, to make sure your workplace is properly prepared to handle these unique times. But I wanted to try to connect again.
I’ve been working with different companies to help them reduce their business costs by updating their account plan. After taking a deep dive into your account, I see that you can benefit from switching to a new plan that will help you achieve savings that are usually reserved for large businesses.
You’ll be able to save either 10% or 15% on solutions across all office essentials, including Paper and Cleaning & Maintenance products. And if the savings guarantee isn’t met, you’ll receive a rebate for the difference! Feel free to check out these plans in more detail here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Jimmy_Supporting_Your_Business_is_Our_Business.html]]>.
I just want to remind you that I’ll be your account manager from now on, so that means I’ll be your dedicated point of contact.If you have any questions or don’t feel as though these two plans satisfy your needs, feel free to contact me so we can discuss a solution that’s right for you.
Thanks,
Jimmy Kyung Inside Account Manager
Providing you with the products, services and solutions your business needs to be more productive and successful.
